name: Akumi Wars Demo
description:
A story-driven turn-based strategy RPG video game

Akumi's putting together a crew of bounty hunters for the biggest, riskiest, and most treasure-filled gig of her life. Want in?

Build your own party of irresponsible misfit heroes and delve into an epic world story with the ultimate goal of... avoiding needing to work retail. Armed with weapons, magic, and a distracting amount of leg, hop aboard your airship for adventure.

Find and add custom skills to your hero's already powerful skill kits to make them completely overpowered!

Join us on Discord, Twitter,  Facebook, and Instagram.

Play the demo and if you love what we're building, then back Akumi Wars on Kickstarter to help finish the game!
